price: He said, “They are following my footsteps; I hastened to You, my Lord, to please You.”
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
